website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Pulse 10 managed to impress both testers and wearers alike. The shoe received overwhelmingly positive reviews about its comfort level, support structure, and reliable elements. The shoe’s fit was also agreeable for many. Although some users found durability issues and problems with sizing, the majority do consider the Asics Gel Pulse 10 to have a good price-to-quality ratio and cited that they would recommend the shoe to their peers.
pros: Many users agreed that the Asics Gel Pulse 10 is comfortable to wear, especially in long periods of time
A few customers wrote that the shoe provided good support for high arches
The Gel Pulse 10 had a snug and secure fit around the midfoot, according to several wearers
The shoe was also suitable for indoor workouts, according to a couple of users
The midsole was bouncy and responsive, a tester commented
Some runners felt that the shoe reduced knee and ankle pains
The well-cushioned tongue allowed for more movement, a buyer observed
cons: The Gel Pulse 10 started to tear apart after just a couple of uses, according to a customer
Some users thought the shoe ran small

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: My first ever return in Amazon is this product and I’ve purchased at least 50 odd products since being a member. Been a massive fan of ASICS, but, feel let down by this product. Too small a fit for the size. Cramped in the toe area as it’s too narrow for the size. I wore it only for 30 mins and my toe hurts already.
customer_reviews.author: Venkataramana Jammalamadugu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn these three times and they are coming apart. I will be contacting seller for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Izzy R

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for marathon training rather than wearing out my Asics Gel 20s. Considering the price difference, £75, these are a fantastically comfortable pair of shoes. Too soon to sees how they wear but so far they appear excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: A trainer/shoe which does its job, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Every day wear. Now into my eightieth decade, I appreciate a well-designed product, a trainer which fits and feels like a glove, but a well-designed and built glove; even though I am forced to use orthotic supports.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great cushion
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair of running trainers!! I had to buy a pair of insoles because of the way I run but still these are fantastic I’ve had them a little over a month and already racked up 100miles in them! Ranging from 6min miles to recovery 8 and a half’s they suit all purposes well. I’m a size 9 in all shoes and these are snug but I think that’s due to the insoles but even after an 18miler last week there was no rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these trainers do not fit, my husband has always purchased ASICS online but these are a size too small. The seller is not interested in refunding me as they had been worn once.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: My 1st pair of ASICS trainers, and it certainly won’t be the last. Quality, comfortable and long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great, very pleased. Always liked Asics. These are very slick and comfortable, good cushioning. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long. The padding in the shoe didn't last long and the heel started to rub me after 6 months. Do at least 30 k a week so 6 months isn't too bad, but not great. Gone back to Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: pottypea

customer_reviews.title: falling apart after 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality for the price. Mine are falling apart after 3-4 months. Sole is coming off. Ankles have holes and desolve.
customer_reviews.author: cs123

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Pulse 10 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Establish record times on your favorite routes wearing the comfortable GEL-PULSE 10. Each support is softer on the feet with these running shoes, thanks to the cushioning system of the forefoot and backfoot. In addition, your foot will rotate smoothly in the deadlift with a Super SpEVA midsole with a large rebound, for faster and more effective thrusts. Enjoy the superb comfort offered by the elastic midsole and the GEL cushioning. Run without wasting effort thanks to the flexible grooves that help guide your foot. Simple and uniform stride thanks to the more elastic Super SpEVA midsole.
